KEY REQUIREMENTSA Bachelor’s Degree or Professional Qualification in Human Resource Management.
3 – 5 years of work experience in handling a similar role. 
Holding a Master’s Degree in Human Resources or Business Management would be advantageous. 
Strong knowledge of HR best practices, HR industry trends and Sri Lankan labour law.
Demonstrate experience with HR metrics, HR budgeting, HR systems and databases.
Proven ability to partner with senior leaders to drive HR initiatives.
High-level of leadership capabilities, excellent communication, and presentation skills.
Advanced inter-personal, negotiation and conflict resolution skills. Strong analytical and critical thinking skills. Job Details
